definitions.definition: A removable protective shield separating the inner workings of a machine from operator and observer.
A rigid flat surface that has an active role in the interaction of a device with an operator or user.
A transparent window forming part of a helmet directly in front of the wearer 's face , allowing them to see out.

main_definition: A removable protective shield separating the inner workings of a machine from operator and observer.
secondary_definitions: A rigid flat surface that has an active role in the interaction of a device with an operator or user.
A transparent window forming part of a helmet directly in front of the wearer 's face , allowing them to see out.
